commands: execute unless entity @s[tag=sentinel] run scoreboard players add @s grave.splix.walk_anim 1
execute if entity @s[tag=sentinel] run scoreboard players remove @s grave.splix.walk_anim 1

execute if score @s grave.splix.walk_anim matches -1 run data merge entity @e[tag=sentinel,type=armor_stand,limit=1,sort=nearest,distance=..1.25] {Pose:{LeftArm:[5f,0f,0f],RightArm:[-5f,0f,0f],LeftLeg:[-5f,0f,0f],RightLeg:[5f,0f,0f]}}

execute if score @s grave.splix.walk_anim matches -3 run data merge entity @e[tag=sentinel,type=armor_stand,limit=1,sort=nearest,distance=..1.25] {Pose:{LeftArm:[12.5f,0f,0f],RightArm:[-12.5f,0f,0f],LeftLeg:[-12.5f,0f,0f],RightLeg:[12.5f,0f,0f]}}

execute if score @s grave.splix.walk_anim matches -5 run data merge entity @e[tag=sentinel,type=armor_stand,limit=1,sort=nearest,distance=..1.25] {Pose:{LeftArm:[20f,0f,0f],RightArm:[-20f,0f,0f],LeftLeg:[-20f,0f,0f],RightLeg:[20f,0f,0f]}}

execute if score @s grave.splix.walk_anim matches 0 run data merge entity @e[tag=sentinel,type=armor_stand,limit=1,sort=nearest,distance=..1.25] {Pose:{LeftArm:[-0f,0f,0f],RightArm:[0f,0f,0f],LeftLeg:[0f,0f,0f],RightLeg:[-0f,0f,0f]}}

execute if score @s grave.splix.walk_anim matches 1 run data merge entity @e[tag=sentinel,type=armor_stand,limit=1,sort=nearest,distance=..1.25] {Pose:{LeftArm:[-5f,0f,0f],RightArm:[5f,0f,0f],LeftLeg:[5f,0f,0f],RightLeg:[-5f,0f,0f]}}

execute if score @s grave.splix.walk_anim matches 3 run data merge entity @e[tag=sentinel,type=armor_stand,limit=1,sort=nearest,distance=..1.25] {Pose:{LeftArm:[-12.5f,0f,0f],RightArm:[12.5f,0f,0f],LeftLeg:[12.5f,0f,0f],RightLeg:[-12.5f,0f,0f]}}

execute if score @s grave.splix.walk_anim matches 5 run data merge entity @e[tag=sentinel,type=armor_stand,limit=1,sort=nearest,distance=..1.25] {Pose:{LeftArm:[-20f,0f,0f],RightArm:[20f,0f,0f],LeftLeg:[20f,0f,0f],RightLeg:[-20f,0f,0f]}}
execute unless entity @s[tag=sentinel] if score @s grave.splix.walk_anim matches 5.. run tag @s add sentinel
execute if entity @s[tag=sentinel] if score @s grave.splix.walk_anim matches ..-5 run tag @s remove sentinel
